DOC.brief_summary: The incidence of efficacy failure at 12 months between two regimens.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Sirolimus in End Stage Renal Disease in High Risk Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age: 13 years or older, 40 kgs or more Endstage renal disease AfricanAmerican/Black transplant recipient and/or repeat renal transplant recipient who lost a previous allograft Exclusion Criteria Evidence of active infection Evidence abnormal chest xray Patients with HIV.
